Appearance
From Wiktionary, the free dictionary
See also: frités

Dutch

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Clipping of patates frites, from French patates frites.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • Audio:(file)

Noun

[edit]

frites pl (plural only, no diminutive)

  1. alternative spelling of friet

French

[edit]

Etymology 1

[edit]

Feminine plural of frit, the past participle of frire (“to fry”).

Verb

[edit]

frites

  1. feminine plural of frit

Etymology 2

[edit]

Noun

[edit]

frites f

  1. plural of frite: chips, french fries

Anagrams

[edit]
  • rétifs

Galician

[edit]

Verb

[edit]

frites

  1. second-person singular present indicative of fritir

Portuguese

[edit]

Verb

[edit]

frites

  1. second-person singular present subjunctive of fritar

Spanish

[edit]

Verb

[edit]

frites

  1. second-person singular present subjunctive of fritar
